member.name: P:System.Net.Http.HttpClientHandler.MaxConnectionsPerServer

summary.vsli:raw: Gets or sets the maximum number of concurrent connections (per server endpoint) allowed when making requests using an <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.HttpClient" /> object. Note that the limit is per server endpoint, so for example a value of 256 would permit 256 concurrent connections to http://www.adatum.com/ and another 256 to http://www.adventure-works.com/.

member.summary: Ottiene o imposta il numero massimo di connessioni simultanee (per endpoint server) consentito quando si effettuano richieste tramite un oggetto . Il limite è per ogni endpoint server. Ad esempio il valore 256 autorizza 256 connessioni simultanee a http://www.adatum.com/ e altre 256 connessioni simultanee a http://www.adventure-works.com/.

returns.vsli:raw: The maximum number of concurrent connections (per server endpoint) allowed by an <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.HttpClient" /> object.

member.returns: Numero massimo di connessioni simultanee (per endpoint server) consentite da un oggetto.

returns.vsli:raw: The maximum length, in kilobytes (1024 bytes), of the response headers.
